Html: Hi I was wondering if I could install applications in the TI-84 plus silver edition rom for andriod phones.
I'm curious about this as well..

You can install any of the same apps you have on your normal calc. Download the .8xk file onto your SD card, then swipe from the left edge to bring up the menu. Select the load file menu item. In the list of files that is populated, select the .8xk file and it will be installed.
